title: San Diego/Mission Beach-Pacific Beach
name: The French Gourmet
content: Has been serving delicious pastries and desserts to San Diego since 1979. You can stop in and try one of their many desserts or you can sit down for a whole meal. Their main entr√©es are just as tantalizing as the desserts. The breakfast menu includes omelettes, crepes and French toast and is served on weekends from 8am-2:45pm and on weekdays 10am-2:45pm. Lunch is served until 3pm and dinner is served everyday except Sunday and Monday. They are also a full service catering and wedding cake company.
